cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.CV, cs.IT. 

The paper discusses the use of Markov random fields (MRFs) for modelling statistical dependencies, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The focus is on optimization techniques for MAP inference, which is a problem in optimization and decision making (cs.DS). The paper also mentions the use of MRFs in computer vision (cs.CV) and information theory (cs.IT).
